law.text: Any payments made to any persons claiming an interest in an unclaimed pari-mutuel ticket, and any necessary expense including, but not limited to, administrative costs, advertising costs, court costs and attorney's fees, required to be paid by the racing commission in administering or enforcing the provisions of KRS 230.361 to 230.373 shall be deducted from sums received by the racing commission prior to payment to the Kentucky Racing Health and Welfare Fund.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 472, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 28, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 12, effective June 17, 1978.
